name: M.U.G.E.N Ultimate
description:
TIME FOR THE ULTIMATE FIGHT!!!

With creations from FelixMario, RoySquadRocks, DDRCreations, Warner, and many, many, many others, I am proud to present MUGEN ULTIMATE!!!

M.U.G.E.N is a fighting game engine created with Elecbyte. Since, it had been modded many times.

The game is not finished yet. I am working on adding new characters to the roster every day!!!

For future releases of the game, check the game jolt page: https://superoshawott.gamejolt.io/mugen_ultimate/
